channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipped fridge, 16th October
item.description:
Some git in Belham Walk on D’Eynsford Estate has left their old fridge outside the front door of the block. Sorry you have to deal with this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Don Phelan Close, Camberwell, London

item.title: Alleyway connecting Kilburn high Road to Kilburn priory, 16th October
item.description:

item.title: 49, Lennard Rd, Penge, probably - Prolific spray tag on weathered cream render brick wall pier in front garden butting the footway., 16th October
item.description:
49, Lennard Rd, Penge, probably - Prolific spray tag on weathered cream render brick wall pier in front garden butting the footway. I'm reporting this from memory and looking at Google Streetview. If it is not 49, it is an odd number 40-something very near by.

item.title: Flood in kitchen flat, 16th October
item.description:

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 south side of Park Hall Road, 16th October
item.description:
